text:
Here's what my day looked like today!
*Today I worked:* from 9AM to 7PM with a few hours off for the gym again!
*Today tasks / activities I worked on:* getting on top of lots of emails and adminy-type tasks I had been meaning to check off my list for ages!
*Today my colleague told me:* to grab a beer :beers: (To celebrate the end of a long week!)
*Today I'm learning / reading:* about how to do product design / User Interface / User Experience design
*Today I felt:* relieved that it's the weekend. It's been a long week and I'm looking forward to a break tomorrow, but happy about having achieved lots this week!
